statements: SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = '87654321-1234-5678-9876'
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_amount >= 100.00 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT card_number, card_expiry FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_payments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT payment_id, cvv FROM customer_payments WHERE card_number LIKE '****5678'
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT card_number, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, card_number, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_payments WHERE cvv = '123' OR cvv = '456'
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, address FROM customers LEFT JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, payment_date FROM customers INNER JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE transaction_status = 'Success';
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount FROM customer JOIN payment ON customer.customer_id = payment.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, transaction_type FROM customer JOIN payment ON customer.customer_id = payment.customer_id JOIN transaction ON payment.payment_id = transaction.payment_id WHERE payment.payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.payment_amount FROM customer c INNER JOIN payment p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.payment_amount > 1000;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.payment_amount, t.transaction_type FROM customer c JOIN payment p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN transaction t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND t.transaction_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC, p.payment_amount DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, t.transaction_type FROM customer c LEFT JOIN payment p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id RIGHT JOIN transaction t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.payment_amount FROM customer c JOIN payment p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING SUM(p.payment_amount) > 5000;

SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM customer c LEFT JOIN payment p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id LEFT JOIN transaction t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING num_transactions > 2 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC, c.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, transactions.amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount > 100;

SELECT customers.customer_name, payment_methods.payment_type, transactions.amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN payment_methods ON transactions.payment_method_id = payment_methods.payment_method_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, payment_methods.payment_type, transactions.amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id LEFT JOIN payment_methods ON transactions.payment_method_id = payment_methods.payment_method_id WHERE payment_methods.payment_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT payment_method, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 101 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE customer_id = 5 AND card_expiry_date > '2023-01-01';

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.status, payment_logs.log_message FROM transactions JOIN payment_logs ON transactions.payment_id = payment_logs.payment_id WHERE transactions.status = 'completed';
